name: Private Luxury Studio Apartment - Unit 4
descriptionShort: Luxuriously appointed bachelor apartment, ideal for couples or business travelers tired of ordinary hotels. Recently renovated, it features a modern kitchen, stylish bathroom, queen-size bed, and a dining area perfect for two or for entertaining a few friends. Enjoy free parking, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a private entrance—all in a prime Whitby location.
descriptionLong: Luxuriously appointed bachelor apartment, ideal for couples or business travelers tired of ordinary hotels. Recently renovated, it features a modern kitchen, stylish bathroom, queen-size bed, and a dining area perfect for two or for entertaining a few friends.
Enjoy free parking, high-speed Wi-Fi, and a private entrance for maximum seclusion—all in a prime Whitby location close to the waterfront, marina, Iroquois Park, GO transit, and downtown.
shortDescription: Luxurious bachelor apartment with modern kitchen and prime Whitby location...
